billOfMaterials.summary: An estimated monthly cost breakdown for deploying and running the proposed Fitness Tracking App, assuming a small-to-medium scale MVP with cloud-based backend for authentication, data tracking, AI recommendations, and integrations.

item.name: Backend API Servers (2 instances for auth, tracking, and recommendations)
Managed Database (for user profiles, activities, and social data)
Data Storage and Backup (for encrypted health data and logs)
AI/ML API Usage (for personalized recommendations and insights)
Third-Party Integrations (API calls for wearables like Google Fit/HealthKit)
